note.p: Education: Village school, Skye; University of Glasgow. LLD

Career: Studied under William Thomson, later Lord Kelvin (FRS 1851); ordained as a minister, Free Church of Scotland, but did not take up duties; Lecturer in Mathematics, Glasgow Free Church Training College for Teachers (1857-1901)
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc Series A 1909 vol 82 pp i-v signed by A Gr
